sentences.en: Axis 88 mm Flak 36 now receives intended bonuses from support weapon veterancy.
sentences.cn: 轴心国88炮现在会因为武器班老练升级而被强化.

sentences.en: Flak 88 and Pak 38 moved back into the Support category for Veterancy.
sentences.cn: 88炮和Pak38反坦克炮老练升级由车辆部队老练恢复为支援部队老练.

sentences.en: He took a lot of flak for his stand against abortion.
sentences.cn: 他因坚持反对堕胎而饱受责难.

sentences.en: He's taken a lot of flak for his left-wing views.
sentences.cn: 他的左倾观点受到了强烈指责。

sentences.en: He's taken a lot of flak for his unpopular decisions.
sentences.cn: 他的那些不得人心的决定使他备受批评.

sentences.en: Heavy flak was everywhere! He had been lulled, lured and trapped.
sentences.cn: 到处都是密集的高射炮火! 他这下子可受骗上当, 进了圈套了.

sentences.en: In recent years they have attracted more than their fair share of flak from the press.
sentences.cn: 最近几年他们受到了新闻界过多的责难。

sentences.en: Lilley has taken a lot of flak for his views on drugs.
sentences.cn: 利利对毒品的看法受到强烈抨击。

sentences.en: Police in flak jackets are patrolling the districts hit by the violence.
sentences.cn: 身穿防弹衣的警察正在遭受暴力攻击的地段巡逻.

sentences.en: Some of the new cabinet are attracting flak for their beliefs.
sentences.cn: 一些新内阁成员也因为他们的信仰问题而遭受非议.

sentences.en: The president is getting a lot of flak for that.
sentences.cn: 总统因为那件事正在遭受猛烈抨击。

sentences.en: The President is getting a lot of flak for that.
sentences.cn: 总统正因为那件事备受指责。

sentences.en: There's a flak jacket in a box if you need it.
sentences.cn: 箱子里有件防弹衣,如果需要可以拿上.

sentences.en: They flew into heavy flak over the target area.
sentences.cn: 他们飞入了目标地区猛烈的高射炮火力之中.

sentences.en: This flak's getting heavier. We'll only be able to make one pass.
sentences.cn: 高射炮火力越来越多了. 我们只能经过一次.

sentences.en: Wehrmacht Flak 88 health increased from 200 to 325.
sentences.cn: 国防军防御学的88炮生命值由200增加到325.

trans.tran_cn: 高射炮，过分的或抨击性的批评，争吵，敌对
trans.tran_en: bullets or  shells  that are shot from the ground at enemy aircraft
